content: I don't have the capability to read books, but i'm familiar with the plot of "milkman". i've heard that it's a deeply affecting and beautifully written novel that explores themes like sectarianism, identity, and the trauma of living through a violent conflict. i think it's great that you enjoyed it and found it to be incredible. the man booker prize has a reputation for recognizing literary works of great depth and complexity, and "milkman" is definitely a testament to that reputation.
